summary: Tested AssocialDashboard page (/ass-social) for Assistente Social role. All requested features are working correctly: page loads, search by name (3+ chars), search by CPF, student details display, attendance info shows 'Sem registro de frequência' for students without records.
critical_code_review_comments: AssocialDashboard.js correctly implements blue header with SIGESC logo and 'Assistência Social' subtitle
Search properly filters after 3 characters with debounce (300ms)
Student details card shows all required fields: Nome completo, Data de nascimento, Nome da mãe, Escola, Série/Turma, Frequência
Dashboard.js correctly redirects ass_social users to /ass-social (line 99-102)
App.js route /ass-social properly restricts access to ['admin', 'admin_teste', 'ass_social'] roles
data-testid attributes are properly implemented for all interactive elements
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data (ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO)
context_for_next_testing_agent: AssocialDashboard page is fully functional. The test student 'ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO' has: CPF 123.456.789-00, birthdate 10/05/2015, mother name 'RICLEIDE DA SILVA GONCALVES', school 'ESCOLA TESTE MULTISSERIADA', class 'Não informada' (no class_id assigned), and no attendance records.

feature_1_page_loads.description: /ass-social page loads correctly with blue header, SIGESC logo, and search interface

feature_2_search_by_name.description: Search by name works correctly - filters only after 3 characters, found 'ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO' when searching 'teste'

feature_3_search_by_cpf.description: CPF search mode activates correctly with 'Buscar por CPF' button, placeholder changes to CPF format

feature_4_student_details.description: Student details display correctly: Nome (ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO), Data de nascimento (10/05/2015), Nome da mãe (RICLEIDE DA SILVA GONCALVES), Escola (ESCOLA TESTE MULTISSERIADA), Série/Turma (Não informada)

feature_5_attendance_info.description: Attendance section shows 'Sem registro de frequência' when no attendance records exist for the student

feature_6_redirect_logic.description: Dashboard.js correctly implements redirect for ass_social users to /ass-social page (code verified lines 99-102)

feature_7_close_details.description: Close button (X) on student details card works correctly

feature_8_logout_button.description: Logout button is present in the header

feature_9_3char_validation.description: Shows 'Digite pelo menos 3 caracteres' message when typing less than 3 characters

notes.student_data: Test student 'ALUNO TESTE ATUALIZADO' shows 'Série/Turma: Não informada' because no class_id is assigned to this student
notes.attendance_data: Student shows 'Sem registro de frequência' because there are no attendance records for this student in the database
notes.redirect_not_directly_testable: Direct redirect test for ass_social user not performed because no user with ass_social role credentials were provided. Code review confirms redirect is implemented correctly.
